query:
SELECT a.MFG_AREA,a.MFG_CENTER,a.SFCNUMBER,a.ROUTERNAME,a.OPERATION,a.STEP,a.QTYINQUEUE,a.QTYINPROCESS,a.QTY_WIP,a.IN_QUEUE,a.QUEUE_TIME,a.STALLED_TIME,a.PROCESSLOT,a.SHOPORDER,a.ITEM_ID,b.cycle_time,b.start_date FROM
(SELECT loc.mfg_area, loc.mfg_center, loc.sfcnumber, loc.routername routername,loc.operation operation, loc.step,loc.qtyinqueue, loc.qtyinprocess, loc.qtyinqueue+loc.qtyinprocess qty_wip,pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart) IN_QUEUE,
Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart),3)  queue_time,CASE WHEN (Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart),3) > 3 AND Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart),3) < 7)
THEN '+3' WHEN (Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart),3) >=7 AND Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart),3) < 15) THEN '+7' WHEN (Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart),3) >=15
AND Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(loc.queuestart),3) < 30) THEN '+15' WHEN (Round(SYSDATE - pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(Loc.queuestart), 3) >= 30) THEN '+30' Else '-3' END stalled_time,
nbr.processlot , nbr.shoporder, nbr.item_id FROM sfdm.sfc_loc loc, sfdm.sfc_nbr nbr WHERE loc.sfcnumber LIKE '%' AND operation like 'PURGE%' AND loc.MFG_CENTER='OSA'
AND loc.routername LIKE '%' AND loc.mfg_area='MATAMOROSF' AND loc.site_id = 'MZ' AND (loc.QTYINPROCESS > 0 OR loc.QTYINQUEUE > 0) AND loc.sfcnumber=nbr.sfcnumber AND loc.site_id=nbr.site_id AND loc.mfg_area=nbr.mfg_area
AND nbr.statusflag < 7 ORDER BY routername, operation ) a,( SELECT SFCNUMBER,Round(SYSDATE-pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(queuestart),3) Cycle_time,pk_oe_dates.unix2oradate(queuestart) start_date FROM sfdm.sfc_loc WHERE step = '10') b WHERE a.sfcnumber = b.sfcnumber
queryName: Query de Wip por codigo con stalled time
